diff_hunk:
@@ -34,12 +43,16 @@ def should_build_ib():
     Helper function that detects the system's IB support and returns if we
     should build with IB support.
     """
+    ib_util_found = False
body: Couldn't one conceivably want to build a binary with Infiniband support on a system that doesn't actually have a working ib-devinfo command, so that the binary could be shipped over? In that case, you wouldn't want this test anymore.
body_html: Couldn't one conceivably want to build a binary with Infiniband support on a system that doesn't actually have a working ib-devinfo command, so that the binary could be shipped over? In that case, you wouldn't want this test anymore.
